meanings.definition: A person who adheres to a particular confession or statement of faith.
meanings.sent1: The confessionalists gathered every Sunday to discuss their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Many confessionalists follow the teachings of their chosen faith.
meanings.sent3: The confessionalists had a potluck to celebrate their shared beliefs.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated confessionalist, unwavering in her faith.
meanings.sent5: The group of confessionalists prayed together in unity.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a confession or statement of faith.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed beautiful confessionalist artwork.
meanings.sent2: Her confessionalist beliefs influenced her daily decisions.
meanings.sent3: The confessionalist decorations added a peaceful atmosphere to the room.
meanings.sent4: His confessionalist dedication shone through his actions.
meanings.sent5: The confessionalist music filled the hall with serenity.
